SUPER_ADMIN.description: Full access to everything. Configuration owner.

FLEET_MANAGER.description: Operational oversight. Can manage vehicles, drivers, expenses.

DISPATCHER.description: Can view fleet, assign routes, manage incidents. No financial access.

MECHANIC.description: Can view/update maintenance records, work orders, parts. No dispatch access.

DRIVER.description: Can view own assignments, history. Can submit inspections/incidents. Minimal access.

FINANCIAL_AUDITOR.description: Read-only access to financial records and reports.

HR_MANAGER.description: Can manage driver profiles, onboarding, licensing. No vehicle operations.
